column4: argh, whenever a kernel is updated, it always sets my grub config to boot from (hd1,0) and not (hd0,0) like it should be.. (i can manually fix it, but i have to do this after every kernel update..)
in your /boot/grub/menu.lst at the top you should have a list of # options you need to read down and there should be a place to change the auto config root
